metadata.title: CVE-2024-36610 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Rejected reason: DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. Reason: This candidatewas issued in error. Notes: All references and descriptions in thiscandidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-symfony - 6.4.5+dfsg-3ubuntu3
php-symfony-all-my-sms-notifier - 6.4.5+dfsg-3ubuntu3
